title: Program to Enhance E-Learning Effectiveness Through AI-Based Personal Learning Environment (PLE) Construction

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and experience with LMS (Learning Management System) usage
context.additional_context: AI-based Personal Learning Environment (PLE) design and utilization competency enhancement for pre-service/in-service teachers, specialized in language education.

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized learning profiles (PLP) utilizing AI tools
Learners can effectively integrate PLE components (PLP, PLN, PLE) in electronic learning environments
Learners can develop customized educational content by integrating LMS and AI tools
Learners can evaluate educational effectiveness (perceived usefulness/ease of use) by analyzing PLE application cases
Learners can design e-learning effectiveness measurement models with reference to PLS-SEM analysis methodology

resources: AI-Powered Learning Analytics Tools (e.g., IBM Watson, Google AI)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
